Name: id
Description: The ID of the institution as designated by Belvo.

Name: name
Description: The name of the institution, as designated by Belvo.

Name: type
Description:
The type of institution. We return one of the following values:

  - `bank`
  - `fiscal`
  - `employment`

Name: website
Description: The URL of the institution's website.

Name: display_name
Description: The customer-facing name of the institution.

Name: country_codes
Description:
The country codes where the institution is available, for example:
- ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡· BR (Brazil)
- ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡´ CO (Colombia)
- ðŸ‡²ðŸ‡½ MX (Mexico)

Name: primary_color
Description: The primary color on the institution's website.

Name: logo
Description: The URL of the institution's logo.

Name: icon_logo
Description: The URL of the institution's icon logo.

Name: text_logo
Description: The URL of the institution's text logo.

Name: form_fields[].name
Description: The username, password, or username type field.

Name: form_fields[].type
Description: The input type for the form field. For example, string.

Name: form_fields[].label
Description:
The label of the form field. For example:
- Client number
- Key Bancanet
- Document

Name: form_fields[].validation
Description: The type of input validation used for the field.

Name: form_fields[].placeholder
Description: The placeholder text in the form field.

Name: form_fields[].validation_message
Description: The message displayed when an invalid input is provided in the form field.

Name: form_fields[].values
Description:
If the form field is for documents, the institution may require additional
input regarding the document type.

Name: form_fields[].values[].code
Description: The code of the document.

Name: form_fields[].values[].label
Description:
The label for the field. For example:
- CÃ©dula de CiudadanÃ­a
- CÃ©dula de ExtranjerÃ­a
- Pasaporte

Name: form_fields[].values[].validation
Description: The type of input validation used for the field.

Name: form_fields[].values[].validation_message
Description: The message displayed when an invalid input is provided in the form field.

Name: form_fields[].values[].placeholder
Description: The placeholder text in the form field.

Name: features
Description:
The features that the institution supports. If the institution has no special features, then Belvo returns an empty array.

Here is a list of the available features:
- `token_required` indicates that the institution may require a token during link creation or when making any other requests.

Name: features[].name
Description: The name of the feature.

Name: features[].description
Description: The description of the feature.
Example: The institution may require a token during link creation or login

Name: resources
Description:
A list of Belvo resources that you can use with the institution. This list includes one or more of the following resources:

  - `ACCOUNTS`
  - `BALANCES`
  - `BILLS`
  - `EMPLOYMENTS`
  - `EMPLOYMENT_RECORDS`
  - `FINANCIAL_STATEMENTS`
  - `INCOMES`
  - `INVESTMENTS`
  - `INVESTMENT_TRANSACTIONS`
  - `INVOICES`
  - `OWNERS`
  - `RECURRING_EXPENSES`
  - `RISK_INSIGHTS`
  - `TRANSACTIONS`
  - `TAX_COMPLIANCE_STATUS`
  - `TAX_RETENTIONS`
  - `TAX_RETURNS`
  - `TAX_STATUS`

Name: integration_type
Description:
The type of technology used to access the institution. We return one of the following values:

- `credentials`: Uses Belvo's scraping technology, combined with user credentials, to perform requests.
- `openfinance`: Uses the bank's open finance API to perform requests.

Name: status
Description: Indicates whether Belvo's integration with the institution is currently active (`healthy`) or undergoing maintenance (`down`).

Name: openbanking_information
Description: Information about the institution on the Open Finance environment.

Name: openbanking_information.description
Description: A short description of the institution on the Open Finance environment. Extracted from Open Finance regulated institutions listing.
Example: A 1ss Bank Ã© uma fintech fundada em janeiro de 2020, com a missÃ£o de ajudar empresas com grandes ecossistemas a se tornarem fintechs, integrando e automatizando seus processos financeiros atravÃ©s de APIs e plataforma white-label.

Name: openbanking_information.participants
Description: List of brands' servers available from the institution in Open Finance. Extracted from Open Finance regulated institutions listing.

Name: openbanking_information.authorization_server_id
Description: The authorization server ID (UUID) of the institution on the Open Finance Environment.
